name: Woah, that's deep.
description:
"Woah, That's Deep." is an endless exploration survival game, where you must control a little submarine through the depths and avoid the hazardous fish along the way.

CONTROLS
Left Arrow Key / A -- Move the submarine to the left.
Right Arrow Key / D -- Move the submarine to the right.

OBJECTIVE 
You must pilot your submarine friend through the depths of a dangerous trench, and avoid the enemy deep-sea fish. As your score increases, the light around your submarine will get dimmer and dimmer. The higher you're able to descend, the higher your score! 

DEVELOPER'S NOTES
This game is our submission to Ludum Dare 48, with the theme "Deeper and Deeper". We wanted to take a simple approach to an endless descent game, that increased in difficulty as the player progressed.  All assets used were made from scratch. 

Good luck to everyone else participating in the game jam, and thanks so much for checking out our game!

CREDITS
@Aria - Art, Animation, Rigging, Game Design
@Mukaba- Programming, Game Design
@Kryndir - Audio/Music, Game Design

RESOURCES

Art/Animation -- https://www.autodesk.com/products/maya/
Engine -- https://unity.com/
